import re

def split_reverse_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    words = re.findall('\\S+', sentence)
    words.reverse()
    return words

import re

def split_reverse_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('^\\s+|\\s+$', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    words = re.findall('\\S+', sentence)
    words.reverse()
    return words

import re

def split_reverse_sentence(sentence):
    sentence = re.sub('^\\s+|\\s+$', '', sentence)
    words = re.findall('', sentence)
    words.reverse()
    return words
